de.engehausen.treemap.impl

Class RectangleImpl<N>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.engehausen.treemap.impl.RectangleImpl<N>
  • Type Parameters:
    N - the type of node backing the tree map.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRectangle<N>

    public class RectangleImpl<N>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IRectangle<N>
    Rectangle implementation. Additionally supports splitting a rectangle in two along the longer of its sides and to "subtract" one rectangle from the other, given some special circumstances the tree map engine provides.
